extendedInfo.description: Download the ESPN Fantasy Baseball app now for FREE and get all the information you need before your draft and to manage your teams throughout the season! Manage multiple teams and leagues, follow your matchups in real time, add/drop/trade players, and make last second lineup changes from wherever you are. The ESPN Fantasy Baseball App will keep you connected so you never miss a step in your league.The ESPN Fantasy Baseball app features:-Team Management: Start/bench players, add, drop, and claim players off waivers, propose, accept or reject trades with other managers-FantasyCast Live Scoring and Stats: Real-time scoring and detailed information for all your matchups.-Fantasy News, Videos and Tweets from ESPNâs fantasy analysts.-View and post messages to your leagueâs message boardBecome an ESPN Insider for access to the following exclusive features:-Personalized Push Notifications will alert you when you have a player headed to the DL or an eligible player on the bench.-Exclusive video and breaking news from ESPN experts including Matthew Berry, Eric Karabell and Christopher Harris.-Spring Training Notes, Rookie Reports, Breakout Candidates and advice from the best fantasy experts in the industry.Download now because there's no better time to check on your fantasy teams, than anytime you please.NOTE: You must have an ESPN Fantasy Baseball team to use this app. This app will only manage your current teams. Past and future teams are not supported.

reviews.title: Needs more features
reviews.comment: Great for setting my lineup day to day but I would like to see news updates and batter vs pitcher stats
reviews.author: monica bhattacharjee

reviews.title: Good, not great.
reviews.comment: Can be a little hard to navigate/find things at times. Updates and scores are perfect and up to the second!
reviews.author: Jordan Bianucci

reviews.title: Great APP!
reviews.comment: On my team page the lines don\'t always line up straight makes it hard to know the stats for each player! Fix this and its a 5!
reviews.author: Todd Wright

reviews.title: Still missing key features
reviews.comment: You still can\'t find bvp for each gm. You also can\'t see who is pitching for the opponent for all your offensive players. This is useful for knowing whether the pitcher is righty or lefty.  Otherwise, it is a great app.
reviews.author: Dan Rodell

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: I\'m glad the app exists, but functionality and layout are so limited that it is usually easier to just log in to the browser.  I\'m on a tablet, please at least update the app enough that avg and whip can be seen without clicking or scrolling
reviews.author: Bry Reid

reviews.title: shuts down
reviews.comment: often stops responding and shuts down. much easier to just use the website. there should be a windows phone app for this too
reviews.author: Marc Reed

reviews.title: Great ap!
reviews.comment: Useful with all tools needed to move, drop, or trade players as well as research opponents lineups. Two thumbs up and i only have two!
reviews.author: David Cook

reviews.comment: Great app! Easy to use and always responsive. My only suggestion is to be able to view the box scores from the day before if you want to
reviews.author: michael santulli

reviews.title: Its ok.
reviews.comment: Would be nice if the app was more like the online version. With bvp, and other stats. Would be nice if the player updates were free. The interface is decent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantasy baseball is awesome!
reviews.comment: This is a must have for anyone whom loves fantasy league. I\'ve been playing fantasy sports for over 10 years now and love everything about it!
reviews.author: John Sobiech

reviews.title: Needs a few improvements
reviews.comment: Needs the live score while games are on. Otherwise pretty good!
reviews.author: Dennis Kolk

reviews.comment: Could use more info..not too bad though..works in a pinch to change line ups and thats what i got it for.\tUpdates arent perfect...i mean who cares if my SP not starting today could fill an unused spot?
reviews.author: Mark Johnson

reviews.title: Features needed
reviews.comment: Needs more functionality to be more like the website. Also could use  a considerable face lift. Should display more information especially for bigger screen phones. Stable and useful, great update speed.
reviews.author: Ryan Faloona

reviews.title: I App itself is good.
reviews.comment: Few minor things, like pressing back after looking at a players stats it takes you to the first page instead of where you left off. Annoying. I wish you could sort columns of your own choosing, Avg pts, start %, ect.
reviews.author: Adam Trace

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Can\'t complain.  Could always hope for more functionality like the full site. But for a free app, it is great!
reviews.author: Scott Schmidt

reviews.title: Excellent app for fantasy baseball fans.
reviews.comment: I Love this APP. I am an avid fantasy baseball player and this app provides me with the most up do date information and features I need to be successull.
reviews.author: Steve Higgins

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: The app won\'t open. I gave it one star because it won\'t let me give a zero. This better be fixed soon.
reviews.author: Michael Taylor

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: I like the fantasy baseball app. A couple of ideas to improve it would be to support landscape views and provide a real-time view like fantasy cast.
reviews.author: Jeff Thompson

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: I am constantly checking stats,  proposing trades and adjusting my line up!  I would like to see this app rank the players like the website,  but this is my most used app. Keep up the good work!  Samsung GS3
reviews.author: Joshua Montgomery
